title: Getting 0x0 for eth_getBalance even though Geth returns value
body:
### We have differences in responses between Erigon and Geth.

```
curl --request POST \
  --url http://<ERIGON_URL> \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "method": "eth_getBalance",
  "params": ["0x5C43754319639Fd9E1b500AA64DF87BEce0a4381", "0x23636c9"]
}'
```

Our Erigon (thorax/erigon:v2.52.4) returns:
```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "result": "0x0"
}
```

although Geth returns:
```
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": "0xe22a75e2f19a7d7",
  "id": 1
}
```

Latest synced block in our node is `40,669,809` which came 7 days after the problematic block used for `eth_getBalance` example.
